00141 inline void PreprocessorStatistics::updateTotalTime ()
00142 {
00143     totalTime_ = globalThresholdingTime_ + templateFilteringTime_ + averagingFilteringTime_ + skewnessCorrectionTime_ + regionsExtractionTime_;
00144 };
